name: How to Cheat
description:
Can you survive the exam? Use any method possible that you can think of. Be creative! Use your clever brain! and cheat your way out of this nightmare. 

Timing is important! Don't waste your time even for a split second! Find the most efficient way to make the best use of your time. Fast and accurate, that's the key!

Evaluate your cheating method and try again as much as you need. You can always retake the exam. With enough trials and errors, you'll be succeed eventually!
